column4: What is Swiss Cottages Bhurban?
column5: Swiss Cottages Bhurban is a premium private cottage accommodation located in the scenic hills of Bhurban near Murree. It offers fully furnished Swiss-style cottages designed for families and groups who want privacy, comfort, and beautiful mountain views instead of a typical hotel stay.

column4: What type of property is Swiss Cottages?
column5: Swiss Cottages is not a hotel or hostel. It is a private cottage setup where guests get the entire cottage to themselves, including bedrooms, living areas, kitchen, terrace, and parking.

column4: What makes Swiss Cottages different from hotels?
column5: Unlike hotels, Swiss Cottages provides larger living spaces, private kitchens, outdoor terraces, and more privacy. It is ideal for families and groups who prefer a home-like environment with scenic views.

column4: Is Swiss Cottages suitable for families?
column5: Yes, Swiss Cottages is very family-friendly. The cottages are spacious, located in a gated community, and suitable for families with children, elders, and group stays.

column4: What is Swiss Cottages Bhurban?
column5: Swiss Cottages Bhurban is a privately owned luxury cottage accommodation located in the Murree Hills at Bhurban. It offers fully furnished 3-bedroom cottages designed for families and groups looking for privacy, comfort, scenic views, and personalized service instead of a traditional hotel stay.

column4: What type of experience do you offer at Swiss Cottages?
column5: Swiss Cottages offers a peaceful, scenic, and private stay experience focused on comfort, nature, and relaxation. Guests enjoy spacious living areas, mountain views, personalized support, and a calm environment ideal for family vacations, group trips, and weekend getaways.

column4: What cottages are available at Swiss Cottages?
column5: Swiss Cottages currently offers Cottage 9 and Cottage 11 for stays. Additional cottages may also be available depending on inventory and season.

column4: Is Swiss Cottages safe and secure?
column5: Yes, Swiss Cottages is located inside a secure gated community with security arrangements in place. Guest safety and comfort are a top priority, making it suitable for families, couples, and group stays.

column4: What properties are available at Swiss Cottages?
column5: Currently, Swiss Cottages offers multiple 3-bedroom cottages including Cottage 9 and Cottage 11. Each cottage is fully furnished and differs slightly in size, furniture style, and balcony or terrace space.

column4: Describe Cottage 9
column5:
Cottage 9 is an elegant two-storey luxury cottage, thoughtfully designed to offer comfort, privacy, and scenic beauty. The ground floor, conveniently accessible from the car parking level, features a tastefully furnished lounge with breathtaking views, a luxurious master bedroom with a charming slanted hut-style roof and an en-suite bathroom, and a modern, well-equipped kitchen with a dining area.

The private balcony provides comfortable seating for 4â€“5 guests, making it an ideal spot to enjoy breakfast or evening tea while taking in the serene mountain surroundings.

The lower level includes two beautifully designed bedrooms that share a common bathroom, along with a functional kitchen, making Cottage 9 especially suitable for families or groups seeking a refined and peaceful mountain getaway.

column4: Describe Cottage 11
column5:
Cottage 11 is a cozy two-storey cottage, carefully designed for comfort, warmth, and family-friendly living. The ground floor, accessible directly from the car parking level, includes a furnished lounge with beautiful scenic views, a luxurious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, and a modern kitchen with a dining area.

A key highlight of Cottage 11 is its beautiful attic space located above the master bedroom, which serves as an additional cozy sleeping area. This feature is especially popular with families and children, adding both charm and extra functionality to the cottage.

The private balcony offers relaxing views and a peaceful natural atmosphere. The lower level hosts two well-designed bedrooms sharing a common bathroom, along with a fully equipped kitchen, making Cottage 11 an excellent choice for comfortable family stays.

column4: Describe Cottage 7
column5:
Cottage 7 is a charming two-bedroom corner cottage that offers enhanced privacy and exceptional dual-sided panoramic views of both the mountains and lush garden surroundings. Its corner positioning makes it one of the most scenic cottages in the community.

The ground floor, easily accessible from the car parking level, features a spacious and sunlit lounge with large windows, a modern open kitchen, and a dining area, all designed to maximize natural light and views. A well-appointed bathroom is also located on this level for added convenience.

The lower floor includes two beautifully designed bedrooms, each with dual-aspect windows that allow abundant natural light. One bedroom has a private en-suite bathroom, while the second bedroom uses a bathroom located just outside the room, ensuring comfort and practicality for families or groups.

column4: What is the difference between Cottage 7, Cottage 9, and Cottage 11?
column5:
Cottage 7, Cottage 9, and Cottage 11 each offer a unique layout and experience while maintaining the same high standards of comfort and privacy.                                             ğŸ”˜ View Cottage Photos
ğŸ‘‰ https://swisscottagesbhurban.com/

ğŸ”˜ Help Me Choose
ğŸ‘‰ https://swisscottagesbhurban.com/contact-us/

Cottage 7 is a two-bedroom corner cottage known for its dual-sided panoramic views of the mountains and gardens. Its corner positioning provides enhanced privacy, abundant natural light, and scenic views from multiple angles. It is ideal for smaller families or groups who value views and privacy.

Cottage 9 is an elegant three-bedroom, two-storey cottage designed for families and larger groups. It features a spacious lounge, a master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom on the upper level, a balcony with seating for 4â€“5 guests, and two additional bedrooms on the lower level. It offers a refined layout with scenic views and generous living space.

Cottage 11 is a cozy three-bedroom, two-storey cottage that is especially popular with families. It includes a unique attic sleeping space above the master bedroom, which is particularly loved by children. The cottage offers a comfortable lounge, private balcony, and well-planned living areas, making it a warm and family-friendly option.

Overall, Cottage 7 is best for couples or small families seeking privacy and views, Cottage 9 suits larger families or groups needing more space, and Cottage 11 is ideal for families looking for a cozy stay with an extra sleeping area.

column4: What is Cottage 9?
column5: Cottage 9 is a 3-bedroom luxury cottage suitable for families and medium-sized groups. It includes bedrooms, bathrooms, a lounge, a fully functional kitchen, and a balcony or terrace with scenic valley views.

column4: What is Cottage 11?
column5: Cottage 11 is a larger 3-bedroom Swiss-style cottage spread across multiple levels. It offers a spacious lounge, panoramic mountain views, terrace seating, and is ideal for larger groups or extended stays.

column4: Can you tell me about Cottage 7?
column5:
Cottage 7 is a charming two-bedroom corner cottage that offers enhanced privacy and exceptional dual-sided panoramic views of both the mountains and lush garden surroundings. Its corner positioning allows more natural light and wider views compared to standard cottages.

The ground floor, conveniently accessible from the car parking level, features a spacious, sunlit lounge with large windows, a modern open kitchen, and a dining area, all designed to make the most of the scenic surroundings. A well-appointed bathroom is also located on this level for added convenience.

The lower floor hosts two beautifully designed bedrooms, each with dual-aspect windows that bring in abundant natural light. One bedroom includes a private en-suite bathroom, while the second bedroom uses a bathroom located just outside the room, ensuring comfort and practicality for families or small groups.

column4: How many bedrooms are available and what is the total accommodation?
column5: Swiss Cottages offers both 2-bedroom and 3-bedroom cottages. A 3-bedroom cottage can accommodate up to 10 guests, while a 2-bedroom cottage can accommodate up to 6 guests.

column4: How far are the cottages from PC Bhurban and main attractions?
column5: PC Bhurban is approximately a 2-minute drive or a 5-minute walk from the cottages. Most major attractions are nearby and easily accessible.

column4: How do you ensure privacy and cleanliness?
column5: Swiss Cottages is a privately owned property where privacy, cleanliness, and top-quality service are given the highest priority. Each booking is for an entire private cottage, and thorough cleaning is done before every guest stay to maintain high standards.

column4: How is the view from the cottages?
column5: The views from the cottages vary depending on the cottage number, room location, and floor level. Guests can enjoy mountain views, valley views, and lush greenery across the property. Some rooms on the ground floor or basement level offer pleasant greenery or surrounding views rather than open valley views. Cottage 7 is a corner unit and is unique in that it offers dual-sided views, allowing guests to enjoy both mountain and valley views from different sides of the cottage. Overall, every cottage provides a scenic and peaceful environment, with views differing slightly by room and layout.

column4: How is the balcony view from the cottages?
column5: The balconies offer beautiful valley and mountain views, providing a scenic and relaxing environment for guests.

column4: Is Swiss Cottages suitable for families and groups?
column5: Yes, Swiss Cottages is ideal for families and groups. The cottages are spacious, private, and located in a peaceful environment with easy access to nearby attractions and facilities.

column4: What help or support is available during the stay?
column5: Guests are supported by an on-site caretaker who assists with check-in, daily needs, and any issues during the stay. A chef is also available on request to prepare freshly cooked meals for guests.

column4: Is there a kitchen available in the cottages?
column5: Yes, each cottage has a fully functional kitchen where guests can cook their own meals. Guests may also choose to avail chef services by paying an additional fee.

column4: Is car parking available at the cottage?
column5: Yes, free, secure parking is available inside the gated community. Each cottage can accommodate up to two cars.

column4: Do you offer chef services?
column5: Yes, a chef can be arranged on request to prepare freshly made food for guests. This service is available at an additional cost and must be requested in advance.

column4: What facilities are available at the cottages?
column5: Swiss Cottages offers fully furnished cottages with bedrooms, bathrooms, a living lounge, fully equipped kitchen, heating system, Wi-Fi, Smart TV with Netflix, hot water, electricity backup, BBQ facilities, outdoor sitting areas, and secure parking inside a gated community.

column4: What amenities are included in the cottages?
column5: Each cottage includes Wi-Fi, Smart TV, heating, hot water, furnished bedrooms, living areas, kitchen facilities, terrace or balcony, and secure parking within a gated community. A complementary bar is also offered

column4: Is Wi-Fi available?
column5: Yes, Wi-Fi is available in all cottages and is suitable for regular browsing, streaming, and work-related use.

column4: Do the cottages have heating?
column5: Yes, heating arrangements are available, making the cottages suitable for winter stays and cold weather in Bhurban.

This setup allows large teams or corporate groups to stay close together while maintaining comfort, privacy, and a peaceful environment. Guests are accommodated across multiple cottages rather than a single unit, making it ideal for retreats, off-site meetings, or group getaways.

column4: Are the cottages furnished and fully equipped?
column5: Yes, all cottages are fully furnished and equipped with essential furniture, appliances, and amenities for a comfortable stay.

column4: Do the cottages have heating for winter and cooling for summer?
column5: Yes, cottages have centralized heating in the lounge areas and electric heaters in the rooms for winter. During summer, ceiling fans are available and sufficient due to Bhurbanâ€™s pleasant weather.

column4: Are families and children allowed?
column5: Yes, Swiss Cottages primarily accommodates families and children. Unmarried couples are not accommodated.

column4: Is the cottage pet-friendly?
column5: Pets may be allowed with prior permission. Guests must seek approval from management before booking or visiting with pets.

column4: What are the check-in and check-out times?
column5: Check-in starts from 1:30 PM onwards, and check-out is at 12:00 PM sharp.

column4: Is early or late check-in possible?
column5: Early or late check-in may be allowed subject to availability. Guests must request approval from the manager in advance, and additional charges may apply.

column4: Are functions or parties allowed?

column5: Male friend groups are allowed to stay at the cottages.

column4: Is a servant quarter available?
column5: No, servant quarters are not available. However, hotel rooms can be arranged nearby for drivers or house help if required.

column4: Where are Swiss Cottages located?

column4: How far is it from Islamabad?
column5: Swiss Cottages is approximately a 1.5 hour drive from Islamabad, depending on traffic and weather conditions.

column4: Is the road access easy, especially in rain or fog?
column5: Yes, the road access is smooth and suitable for normal vehicles. Guests can comfortably reach the cottages even during rain or fog.

column4: What places are nearby?
column5:
Swiss Cottages Bhurban is ideally located in a prime area of Bhurban, offering quick and easy access to major attractions and daily conveniences. Guests can reach Pearl Continental (PC) Bhurban in just 2 minutes, making it convenient for dining, events, and scenic walks. The Chinar Golf Club is only 5 minutes away, perfect for golf enthusiasts and leisure outings. A nearby masjid is located just 2 minutes from the cottages, allowing easy access for prayers. For daily needs and shopping, the local market is only 5 minutes away, where guests can find groceries, essentials, and small eateries. In addition, the surrounding area features beautiful pine forests and scenic walking trails, ideal for nature lovers and morning or evening walks. column5: Yes, several dining options are nearby, including fine dining at PC Bhurban, Chinar Golf Club, TKR, and many local restaurants. Guests can also choose to dine in by availing chef services at the cottage.

column5: Yes, food delivery is available from nearby local restaurants. Guests can also enjoy BBQ facilities or avail chef services for freshly prepared meals at an additional cost.
